mapper.select: select g.GOODS_NUM goodsNum, GOODS_NAME goodsName, GOODS_CONTENT goodsContent, GOODS_MAIN goodsMain , DELIVERY_COST deliveryCost, MANUFACTURER manufacturer , VISIT_COUNT visitCount, MARKET_NUM marketNum, GOODS_KIND goodsKind , g.TOTAL_IPGO_QTY totalQty, g.goods_price goodsPrice from ( select g.GOODS_NUM , GOODS_NAME , GOODS_CONTENT , GOODS_MAIN , DELIVERY_COST , MANUFACTURER , VISIT_COUNT , MARKET_NUM , GOODS_KIND , i.TOTAL_IPGO_QTY , i.goods_price from goods g left outer join(SELECT GOODS_NUM, SUM(IPGO_QTY) AS TOTAL_IPGO_QTY, MAX(GOODS_PRICE) AS GOODS_PRICE FROM GOODS_IPGO (select * from purchase where member_num = #{userNum}) p on l.purchase_num = p.purchase_num where goods_kind='flower' group by goods_kind)*p.flower+NVL((select count(*) as cnt from goods g join purchase_list l on g.goods_num = l.goods_num join (select * from purchase where member_num = #{userNum}) p on l.purchase_num = p.purchase_num where goods_kind='fleshy' group by p.purchase_num where goods_kind='tree' group by goods_kind),0)*p.tree+NVL((select count(*) as cnt from goods g join purchase_list l on g.goods_num = l.goods_num join (select * from purchase where member_num = #{userNum}) p on l.purchase_num = p.purchase_num where goods_kind='herb' group by goods_kind),0)*p.herb+NVL((select count(*) as cnt from goods g join purchase_list l on g.goods_num = mapper.insert: insert into goods(GOODS_NUM, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_CONTENT, GOODS_MAIN, GOODS_MAIN_ORG, GOODS_IMAGE, GOODS_IMAGE_ORG , DELIVERY_COST, MANUFACTURER, VISIT_COUNT, MARKET_NUM, GOODS_KIND) values(#{goodsNum}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsContent}, #{goodsMain}, #{goodsMainOrg}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsImageOrg} , #{deliveryCost}, #{manufacturer}, 0, #{marketNum}, #{goodsKind})

insert into prp(prp_num ,goods_Num, brilliance, deli_charge, root_yn,flower,seed,herb,tree,fleshy) values((select concat('prp00',nvl(max(substr(prp_num,7)),0)+ 1) from prp), #{goodsNum},#{brilliance} ,#{deliCharge},#{rootYn},#{flower},#{seed},#{herb},#{tree},#{fleshy})
mapper.select: select g.GOODS_NUM goodsNum, GOODS_NAME goodsName, GOODS_CONTENT goodsContent, GOODS_MAIN goodsMain, GOODS_MAIN_ORG goodsMainOrg , GOODS_IMAGE goodsImage, GOODS_IMAGE_ORG goodsImageOrg, DELIVERY_COST deliveryCost, MANUFACTURER manufacturer , VISIT_COUNT visitCount, MARKET_NUM marketNum, GOODS_KIND goodsKind , i.TOTAL_IPGO_QTY totalQty from goods g left outer join(SELECT GOODS_NUM, SUM(IPGO_QTY) AS TOTAL_IPGO_QTY FROM GOODS_IPGO GROUP BY GOODS_NUM ) i on g.goods_num = i.goods_num where g.goods_num=#{goodsNum}

select g.GOODS_NUM goodsNum, GOODS_NAME goodsName, GOODS_CONTENT goodsContent, GOODS_MAIN goodsMain, GOODS_MAIN_ORG goodsMainOrg , GOODS_IMAGE goodsImage, GOODS_IMAGE_ORG goodsImageOrg, DELIVERY_COST deliveryCost, MANUFACTURER manufacturer , VISIT_COUNT visitCount, MARKET_NUM marketNum, GOODS_KIND goodsKind , i.TOTAL_IPGO_QTY totalQty, i.goods_price goodsPrice , r.count reviewCount, r.avg reviewScore from goods g left outer join(SELECT GOODS_NUM, SUM(IPGO_QTY) AS TOTAL_IPGO_QTY, MAX(GOODS_PRICE) AS GOODS_PRICE FROM GOODS_IPGO GROUP BY GOODS_NUM) i on g.goods_num = i.goods_num left outer join (select count(review_num) count , avg(review_score) avg, goods_num from review group by GOODS_NUM) r on g.goods_num = r.goods_num
where g.goods_num = #{goodsNum}

select g.GOODS_NUM goodsNum, GOODS_NAME goodsName, GOODS_CONTENT goodsContent, GOODS_MAIN goodsMain, GOODS_MAIN_ORG goodsMainOrg , GOODS_IMAGE goodsImage, GOODS_IMAGE_ORG goodsImageOrg, DELIVERY_COST deliveryCost, MANUFACTURER manufacturer , VISIT_COUNT visitCount, MARKET_NUM marketNum, GOODS_KIND goodsKind , w.MEMBER_NUM memberNum , i.goods_price goodsPrice from goods g join wish w on g.goods_num = w.goods_num join goods_ipgo i on g.goods_num = i.goods_num where w.member_num = #{memberNum}
mapper.update: update goods set VISIT_COUNT = VISIT_COUNT+1 where goods_num = #{goodsNum}
